Articles.Content:
Simple, extremely well balanced stock vtol I whipped up. Gotta watch the initial take off if using just the lift engine, as just leaving the lift engine on causes some weird stability issues but once you get going the stability issue vanishes.

1 toggles flight engine

2 toggles lift engine

http://www./?js757d90mnr52uj

Edited July 8, 2013 by p331083

Looks nice and clean. The lift issues during VTO are caused by lift and drag balance issues from what I can figure out while tinkering with VTOL designs. I don't think there's a way around it yet without making a craft that has symmetrical values fro and aft. Oh well. Keep it up!
